gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `DesignatedReserve` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `DesignatedReserve` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `DesignatedReserveMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_DesignatedReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`DesignatedReserveMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_DesignatedReserveMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_DesignatedReserveMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfDesignatedReserveMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfDesignatedReserveMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfDesignatedReserveMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesDesignatedReserveMovementSpecificationHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1T1_ChildrenOfDesignatedReserveMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
